title: Signs of the Times VI: God Shall Bestow Victory on Everyone (Symbole der Zeit VI: Jedem soll er den Sieg verliehen) (plate, folio 17 verso) from the periodical Der Bildermann, vol. 1, no. 8 (Jul 1916)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 11 1/4 x 8 1/16" (28.6 x 20.4 cm); page: 14 x 11" (35.5 x 28 cm)
credits: Gift of Mrs. Bertha M. Slattery
